Style/MissingElse.description:
Description

Require if/case expressions to have an else branches. If enabled, it is recommended that Style/UnlessElse and Style/EmptyElse be enabled. This will conflict with Style/EmptyElse if Style/EmptyElse is configured to style "both".
Style/MissingElse.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: both (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['if', 'case', 'both'] (type: list)
